testcase.classname: User buys a product in demo store application
testcase.name: User buys a product
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user login to the application with "johndrew@gmail.com" and "Password123".passed And user was redirected back to home page...................................passed When user search and find product "Selene Yoga Hoodie"......................passed And user selects color and size.............................................passed And user adds product to cart...............................................passed Then user clicks checkout button............................................passed And user verifies address and order details.................................passed And user clicks place order button..........................................passed Then user checks order receipt "Selene Yoga Hoodie".........................passed And user signs out of the application.......................................passed

testcase.classname: User login to demo store application
testcase.name: User logins with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enters email "johnDrew@test.com"..................................passed And user enters password "Password123"......................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed Then user was navigated back to home page...................................passed And user name is visible "John Drew"........................................passed

testcase.classname: User login to demo store application
testcase.name: User logins with empty credentials

testcase.classname: User checks his/her orders in demo store application
testcase.name: User checks orders in the store
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user login to the application with "johndrew@gmail.com" and "Password123".passed And user was redirected back to home page...................................passed And user clicks on my account...............................................passed And user clicks on my orders................................................passed Then user checks his orders.................................................passed And user logs out...........................................................passed

testcase.classname: User creates an account in demo store application
testcase.name: User registers with all fields
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to register page.......................................passed When user enters firstname "John"...........................................passed And user enters lastname "Drew".............................................passed And user enters new random email............................................passed And user enters new password "Password123"..................................passed And user enters confirm password "Password123"..............................passed And user clicks create account button.......................................passed Then user was navigated back to customer page...............................passed And user name in welcome message "John Drew"................................passed

testcase.classname: User creates an account in demo store application
testcase.name: User registers with invalid data - #1.1

testcase.classname: User creates an account in demo store application
testcase.name: User registers with empty credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to register page.......................................passed When user doesnot enters any details........................................passed And user clicks create account button.......................................passed Then user gets firstname warning message "This is a required field."........passed And user gets lastname warning message "This is a required field."..........passed And user gets email error message "This is a required field."...............passed And user gets password and confirm password warning message "This is a required field.".passed
